targets.rawSql:
SELECT profile_pic
	FROM public.user_detail 
	where user_id = 3

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
  inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
  AND d.active = 1

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	  inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	  inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where
    b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) 
    AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
    and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
  inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
  where
	b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	AND d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (5)

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
			where 
			--b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,453,553,561,597,563,566,354,503,599)
			f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
			--and a.feedback is not null

SELECT profile_pic
	FROM public.user_detail 
	where user_id = 3

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
  	inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
  	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
    where
    b.nombre in ($estado) AND c.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia) and
  	d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (1,2)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT count(a.feedback)
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 		
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
			inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
			inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia		
			where 
			f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
			--and b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,453,553,561,597,563,566,354,503,599)
			and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI') --and a.feedback is not null

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
	inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
	where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4) and
	f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true 
	and d.active = 1 
	and d.id_estatus in (6) and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
										   	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
												and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
										   		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												  and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (3,4)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
										   	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
												inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
												inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4)
										   		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												  and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8) and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
												  and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
		inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio	
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
		inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1,2,3,4)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
		and b.principal is true
		and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (6) 
		and (a.feedback >= 2   or  a.verificado = 'SI')
SELECT

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
	where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
	and b.principal is true	and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (354)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (553)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (561)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (597,563,566)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (599)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where b.id_resolutorio in (503)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
and b.principal is true and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (453)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia	
where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
and b.principal is true
and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
SELECT

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso		
											inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
											inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
											inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia											
                                            where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
											and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                            and b.principal is true and d.active = 1
                                            and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
	inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
	inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
	where b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)
	and b.principal is true	and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
	and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
                                           inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                                           inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                                           inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (354)
                                           and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           and d.active = 1
                                           and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
where b.id_resolutorio in (354)
and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
and b.principal is true
and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / ( SELECT count(a.id)
												FROM gestion.caso a
												inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
												inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
												inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
												inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
                        inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
                        inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
												where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
												and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
												and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)
												and b.principal is true
												and d.active = 1
												and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,8))::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
		FROM gestion.caso a

		inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
		inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado

    inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
		where c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1)
		and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
		and a.id_sub_categoria in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)

		and d.active = 1

			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
      inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
			where  b.id_resolutorio in (599)
			and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
			and b.principal is true
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
      inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
			where  b.id_resolutorio in (503)
			and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
			and b.principal is true
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
      inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
			where  b.id_resolutorio in (453)
			and f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
			and b.principal is true
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
			inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
      inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
			where  
			--b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
			c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (1) AND 
			f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
			and b.principal is true
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

SELECT round(avg(a.feedback))::Text "Average" 
			FROM gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
			inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
			inner join gestion.resolutorio c on c.id = b.id_resolutorio
			inner join gestion.estado f on f.id = a.id_estado
      inner join gestion.municipio g on g.id = a.id_municipio
      inner join gestion.parroquia e on e.id = a.id_parroquia
			where  
			--b.id_resolutorio in (478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
			c.id_tipo_resolutorio in (2) AND 
			f.nombre in ($estado) AND g.nombre in ($municipio) AND e.nombre in ($parroquia)	
			and b.principal is true
			and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (6) 
			and a.feedback is not null

select --row_number() OVER (ORDER BY m.nombre) AS "NUM", 
    e.nombre::Text "ESTADO", m.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "RECIBIDO",
		sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "ATENDIDO", 
		trunc(sum(CASE WHEN d.id_estatus in (6) AND (a.feedback >= 2 or a.verificado = 'SI')
		THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)::decimal*100/count(*)::decimal,2) AS "% EFECTIVIDAD %"
		from gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id
		inner join gestion.estado e  on e.id = a.id_estado
		inner join gestion.municipio m on m.id = a.id_municipio
		where  d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
		and m.nombre in ($municipio) and e.nombre in ($estado)
		group by m.nombre, e.nombre order by "% EFECTIVIDAD %" DESC

list.definition:
SELECT distinct a.corredor
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional a
list.label: Corredor Electoral
list.name: corredor
list.query:
SELECT distinct a.corredor
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional a

list.definition:
SELECT distinct estado
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional 
	where corredor = '$corredor'
list.label: Estado
list.name: estado
list.query:
SELECT distinct estado
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional 
	where corredor = '$corredor'

list.definition:
SELECT distinct a.municipio
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional a
	where a.corredor = '$corredor' and estado  in ($estado)
list.label: Municipio
list.name: municipio
list.query:
SELECT distinct a.municipio
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional a
	where a.corredor = '$corredor' and estado  in ($estado)

list.definition:
SELECT distinct a.parroquia
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional a
	where a.corredor = '$corredor' and a.estado in ($estado)  AND a.municipio in ($municipio)
list.label: Parroquia
list.name: parroquia
list.query:
SELECT distinct a.parroquia
	FROM psuv.corredor_electoral_nacional a
	where a.corredor = '$corredor' and a.estado in ($estado)  AND a.municipio in ($municipio)

title: CORREDOR ELECTORAL NACIONAL V3 A ESPERA DE  ESQUEMA PSUV
